content.text: About Inspire|About PCE|About Science Camp|ContactBrochure|Eligibility|Important Dates|Mentors|Organizing Committee|Registration ProcessINSPIRE INTERNSHIP SCIENCE CAMPMahatma Education Society’s,Pillai College of Engineeringis holding itsfirst science camp from 11th to 15th February 2020which is fullysponsored by Department of Science and Technology under INSPIRE (Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspire Research) program. This five-day residential camp will provide good opportunity to the students to interact with scientists of national and international repute. They would provide thought provoking lectures, discussions, hands on laboratory sessions, one to one interaction with students and motivate students to take up research as their future career. Participants will be provided registration kit, free boarding and lodging, and study materials for all five days of the camp.There is no registration fee for the camp. ONLY 150 STUDENTS ARE ALLOWED ON FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS.Download –Brochure|Registration Form
